content: 32sts row 58 k25 turn flip work over so that purl-side faces row 34-36 beginning with a purl row work three row stocking stitch row 59 increase p24 pfb at end of row row 37 increase cast on 16 sts for left back pm place marker on first cast-on row 60 k26 turn flip work over so that purl-side faces stitch for left hind leg back marker k12 pm on 12th stitch for left hind row 61 increase p25 pfb at end of row leg front marker k20 cast off last 16 sts of row for left foreleg inner pm row 62 k27 turn flip work over so that purl-side faces on last cast-off stitch for left foreleg marker - 32sts row 63 p27 to end of row sloth page 6 sloth page 7 row 64 knit across all 38 sts this includes the 27 back sts plus the 11 neck sts short row 4 k3 w+tk row 65-73 beginning with a purl row work nine row stocking stitch short row 5 decrease p6 p2tog at end of row work short row to shape right shoulder row 94-97 work four row stocking stitch short row 1 k27 w+tk row 98 decrease k2tog knit to last 2 sts k2tog - 22sts short row 2 p6 w+tp row 99 purl short row 3 k5 w+tk row 100-113 decrease repeat last 2 row seven times - 8sts short row 4 p4 w+tp row 114-115 work two row stocking stitch short row 5 k16 sts to end of row cast off all 8 right foreleg toe end sts row 74-76 beginning with a purl row work three row stocking stitch joinforeleg seams row 77 decrease k2tog knit to end of row - 37sts ref fig 1 showing left foreleg match a to b and join as dotted lines show row 78 decrease cast off 5 sts p-wise for right side of neck pm on first cast-off working on one foreleg at a time ws together fold the toe-end cast-on stitch for right neck marker purl to end of row - 32sts edge cast-off edge for right foreleg in half then match the foreleg marker row 79 increase cast off 16 sts for right back pm on first cast-off stitch for right to where you divided the foreleg from the body at the back of the foreleg hind leg back marker and 12th cast-off stitch for hind leg front marker mattress stitch to join along the row ends and create the foreleg back k15 to end of row - 16sts seam join across the toe end edges to close the seam row 80 decrease cast on 16 sts for right foreleg inner pm on 16th stitch for right leave the inner foreleg edges open for stuffing later foreleg marker purl across all 32 sts inner foreleg edges row 81-82 work two row stocking stitch a row 83 decrease k2tog knit to last 2 sts k2tog - 30sts right foreleg left foreleg row 84-88 beginning with
